alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 27 at 5:20AM AKST until January 28 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Blowing snow possible for Thompson Pass. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches possible. * WHERE...Northeast Prince William Sound. * WHEN...From this evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A series of storms will track from the Gulf of Alaska north into Southcentral. There remains a high level of uncertainty in the track of this storm. Snow accumulation could end up being much lighter than the amounts above. Additional storm systems and potential for more snow will follow through early next week.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
